duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform field data collection including soil, soil gas, and groundwater sampling.
Manage subcontractors, drilling oversight, and well installation.
Document construction activities and oversee remediation system operations.
Interpret and present data, prepare technical reports, and support environmental investigation and compliance projects.
Prepare work plans, conduct environmental assessments, and manage tasks to ensure scope, budget, schedule, and quality expectations are met.
Interact with clients, vendors, and subcontractors.

education_certification.credential: Associates or Bachelors degree in environmental science, geology, or hydrogeology preferred. Must have excellent communication and writing skills, with an ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
